content: उत्थापनं {@--1@} Causing to rise, come up, or get up. {@--2@} Raising, elevating. {@--3@} Causing to leave (a house). {@--4@} Exciting, instigating. {@--5@} Awakening, rousing (<ab>fig.</ab> also). {@--6@} Vomiting. {@--7@} Finishing, completing. {@--8@} Bringing about. {@--9@} Bringing forth. {@--10@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) Finding the quantity sought, an answer to the question, substitution of a value (<ls>Colebr.</ls>). --नी The concluding verse (ऋच्).
